text:
View this image ›
Nikolay Tsuguliev / Via Getty Images ID: 10239474 etiennevoss / Getty Images Via LSaloni / Getty Images Baguette Via SasaJo / Getty Images Toast Via Magone / Getty Images Ciabatta Via HandmadePictures / Getty Images Whole wheat Via Boarding1Now / Getty Images Croissant Via 5xinc / Getty Images Rye JackJelly / Getty Images Via bhofack2 / Getty Images Cheddar Via Savany / Getty Images American Via ajafoto / Getty Images Swiss tab1962 / Getty Images Via LauriPatterson / Getty Images Roast beef Via LauriPatterson / Getty Images Turkey Via HandmadePictures / Getty Images Ham Via carlosgaw / Getty Images Chicken Via elikatseva / Getty Images Shrimp sergeyshibut / Getty Images Via BWFolsom / Getty Images Jalapeños Via Floortje / Getty Images Avocado Via kaanates / Getty Images Tomato Via levkr / Getty Images Alfalfa sprouts Via artphotoclub / Getty Images Lettuce Via robynmac / Getty Images Red onions Charlie_Edward / Getty Images IgorDutina / Getty Images Via Zoryanchik / Getty Images Pickles Via Magone / Getty Images Chips Via baibaz / Getty Images Fruit Via CuorerouC / Getty Images Cookies Which Classic Sandwich Should You Eat Today? You got: Po’ Boy Ah yes, the traditional Louisiana sandwich. You cannot go wrong with this one.
bhofack2 / Getty Images You got: Club What’s wrong with more bread? Nothing, absolutely nothing.
TheCrimsonMonkey / Getty Images You got: Tuna Melt Melted cheese is the best cheese.
LauriPatterson / Getty Images You got: Veggie You don’t need meat for a killer sandwich.
nata_vkusidey / Getty Images You got: Monte Cristo Breakfast, lunch, dinner – you can eat this classic whenever you want!
ALLEKO / Getty Images You got: Sloppy Joe Extremely messy, extremely finger-lickin’ good.
LauriPatterson / Getty Images You got: BLT Bacon, lettuce, and tomato are great separately but together? Perfection.
janeff / Getty Images You got: Philly Cheesesteak Don’t forget to grab some fries too!
bhofack2 / Getty Images You got: Reuben Sauerkraut and Russian dressing? Yes.
bhofack2 / Getty Images SHARE YOUR RESULTS ID: 10240784
